projectGridLines.title: M& A investment opportunities in Asia
projectGridLines.description:
Description : Interns will work on an ongoing investment opportunity across Asia in telecom infrastructure space (towers,fibers,data centers,IoT, etc.)

Skill sets: Valuation, Stategy, Analytics

Expected learning: Interns will get to experience a live deal; will get to learn financial modelling, understand legal aspects of an acquisition, Post merger integration and portfolio support post investment.

Specific Courses required for project execution: Business Analysis and valuation, Fundamentals of Finance and Accounting, Security Analysis and Portfolio Management.
